title: Control
fullText:
Each socket-outlet used to supply connectable electrical installations shall be controlled by its own individual control switch. The switch shall be â€”
(a) mounted immediately adjacent to the socket-outlet it controls or otherwise suitably identified as to the socket-outlet it controls; and
(b) clearly identified to indicate the off and on positions.
A socket-outlet that is switched by the insertion and withdrawal of the plug is deemed to meet the requirements of this clause.
